name: Darryl A. BELL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Bell v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Darryl A. BELL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of April, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Craig Manning, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
113 A.3d 1229
Darryl A. BELL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 27, 2015.
Darryl A. Bell, pro se.
John Craig Manning, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
